details.bio: Dr. M. Masrur Reaz is the Chairman & CEO of our organization, providing visionary leadership and strategic direction.
details.experience: Dr. Reaz has extensive experience in policy research and development, with a focus on socioeconomic issues.
details.education: Dr. Reaz holds a Ph.D. in Economics from a prestigious university.

details.bio: Hasnat Alam serves as the Senior Manager & Economist at Policy Exchange Bangladesh, overseeing economic analysis and policy formulation.
details.experience: Hasnat has a wealth of experience in economic research and analysis, contributing valuable insights to inform policy decisions.
details.education: Hasnat holds a Master's degree in Economics from a renowned university.

details.education: Ziaur holds a Master's degree in Public Policy from a leading institution.
